text: prorok ye blyzhchyy do viruyuchiv nizh vony musyatʹ odyn odnoho, ta yoho zhinky vyhlyadayutʹ yak materi yim. Rodychi povynni popikluvatysya pro odyn odnym u vidpovidnosti do BOZHOHO svyatoho pysannya. Otzhe, viruyuchi budutʹ popikluvatysya pro yikhnikh rodychiv shcho imihruyutʹ yim, yakshcho vony popikluvalysʹ pro yikhni vlasni sim'yi pershi. Tse - zapovidi tsʹoho svyatoho pysannya
